attributes.action: punishment for social services and police who fail to protect us and do their job properly
attributes.additional_details: loads of times weve heard of police and social services failing to protect us and do their job properly we want the police and social services who fail to protect our children to be punished and not just be given there job back and forget about it action needs to be taken

rejection.details: Home Office cannot publish this as it contains a request for action for DFE (Social Services).  Can separate requests be put in for Social Services/Police?
